StringTable.Label: Transport_Error_ColonyHasOneUnit
StringTable.String: A Colony must have at least one Citizen at all times.

StringTable.Label: Transport_Error_Default
StringTable.String: This Citizen cannot leave this planet.

StringTable.Label: Transport_Error_PlanetFull
StringTable.String: This Core World is already at Maximum Population.

StringTable.Label: Transport_Error_NegativeGrowth
StringTable.String: This Core World has negative growth. Citizen would be at risk of death.

StringTable.Label: Transport_Explanation
StringTable.String: Transport a Citizen to another Colony using a Unit Transport ship.[BR][BR]The estimated [ICON=Turns_Icon]Travel Time is based on distance to the destination.

StringTable.Label: Transport_Alert_Format
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} has been loaded onto a Unit Transport and will arrive on {PLANETNAME} in about {VALUE} turns.
